name: stackflow-contracts-tests
description: Run unit tests on this project.

scripts.simulate:quick: node -e "const {M1Simulator} = require('./simulation/m1-simulation.ts'); const sim = new M1Simulator({strategies:['CALL','BPSP'], tradeCount:200, gasCostPerTrade:0.15}); sim.runSimulation().then(r => console.log('Quick simulation:', r.length, 'trades,', r.filter(t => t.isProfitable).length, 'profitable'));"
